thread.title: BRIEF-Biohaven Says Achieved Both Co-Primary Regulatory Endpoints In Two Pivotal Phase 3 Trials Of Rimegepant

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Biohaven Says Achieved Both Co-Primary Regulatory Endpoints In Two Pivotal Phase 3 Trials Of Rimegepant

organizations.name: brief-biohaven says achieved both co-primary regulatory endpoints in two pivotal phase
reuters) - biohaven pharmaceutical holding company ltd

text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Biohaven Pharmaceutical Holding Company Ltd:
* BIOHAVEN ANNOUNCES SUCCESSFUL ACHIEVEMENT OF BOTH CO-PRIMARY REGULATORY ENDPOINTS IN TWO PIVOTAL PHASE 3 TRIALS OF RIMEGEPANT AN ORAL CGRP RECEPTOR ANTAGONIST FOR THE ACUTE TREATMENT OF MIGRAINE
* RESULTS ARE STATISTICALLY SIGNIFICANT AND CLINICALLY MEANINGFUL ACROSS MULTIPLE OUTCOME MEASURES
* EFFICACY AND SAFETY RESULTS WERE CONSISTENT ACROSS BOTH PHASE 3 TRIALS.
* ON SCHEDULE TO SUBMIT AN NDA FOR RIMEGEPANT IN 2019â€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
